name: Bulbasaur
data:
Breakdown

  • 妙 (miào): wonderful, excellent
  • 蛙 (wā): frog
  • 種子 (zhǒngzǐ): seed

Translation: 'Wonderful Frog Seed' or 'Magical Frog Seed'. The first two characters may also be phonetic, imitating the 'bulba-' part of Bulbasaur.

name: Ivysaur
data:
Breakdown

  • 妙 (miào): wonderful, excellent
  • 蛙 (wā): frog
  • 草 (cǎo): grass

Translation: 'Wonderful Frog Grass' or 'Magical Frog Grass'. Although this Ivysaur, the first two characters may also be phonetic, imitating the 'bulba-' part of Bulbasaur, its base evolution.

name: Venusaur
data:
Breakdown

  • 妙 (miào): wonderful, excellent
  • 蛙 (wā): frog
  • 花 (huā): flower

Translation: 'Wonderful Frog Flower' or 'Magical Frog Flower'. Although this is Venusaur, the first two characters may also be phonetic, imitating the 'bulba-' part of Bulbasaur, its base evolution.

name: Charmander
data:
Breakdown

  • 小 (xiǎo): small, little
  • 火 (huǒ): fire
  • 龍 (lóng): dragon

Translation: 'Little Fire Dragon'

name: Charmeleon
data:
Breakdown

  • 火 (huǒ): fire
  • 恐龍 (kǒnglóng): dinosaur (恐 (kǒng) means fearsome or frightening, 龍 (lóng) means dragon)

Translation: 'Fire Dinosaur' or 'Fearsome Fire Dragon'

name: Charizard
data:
Breakdown

  • 噴 (pēn): spray, spout
  • 火 (huǒ): fire
  • 龍 (lóng): dragon

Translation: 'Spouting Fire Dragon' → 'Fire-breathing Dragon'
